channel.title: I need help with adding skillcapes and hoods
channel.description: you someone help me i really want skillcapes and hoods please help me

item.title: I need help with adding skillcapes and hoods
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

First you’ll have to have a client that has skill capes…
Then if you do, go to your item.cfg and add the id’s…

Ex:

item = 8014 Cooking Cape Its a Cooking Skill Cape 1 1 1 15 15 15 15 15 15 15 15 15 15 1 1

Then, in your client, serach for

case 18:

If you see something in that like… if (playerLevel == 99);
(something like that)

Add, addItem(8014, 1); so it add’s it to your inventory once you reach the aqquired level.
This is very small - and if you have any more problem’s, I suggest learning yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with adding skillcapes and hoods
